00234 template <typename T> integer::integer(const T& n,
00235     typename boost::enable_if<boost::is_integral<T> >::type*,
00236     typename boost::enable_if<boost::is_signed<T> >::type*)
00237 {
00238     if (n >= 0) {
00239         if (static_cast<T>(n & detail::digit_mask) == n)
00240             _attach_1(detail::digit_t(n));
00241         else _attach_n(boost::uintmax_t(n));
00242     } else if (n == (std::numeric_limits<T>::min)()) {
00243         // Have to treat the minimum number carefully, because -n is not
00244         // what you'd think it is.
00245         _attach_n(boost::uintmax_t(-(n+1)));
00246         _set_negative(true);
00247         --(*this);
00248     } else {
00249         _attach_n(boost::uintmax_t(-n));
00250         _set_negative(true);
00251     }
00252 }
00253 
00266 template <typename T> integer::integer(const T& n,
00267     typename boost::enable_if<boost::is_integral<T> >::type*,
00268     typename boost::enable_if<boost::is_unsigned<T> >::type*)
00269 {
00270     if (static_cast<T>(n & detail::digit_mask) == n)
00271         _attach_1(detail::digit_t(n));
00272     else _attach_n(boost::uintmax_t(n));
00273 }
00274 
00285 template <typename T>
00286 T to(const integer& n) {
00287     if (n < (std::numeric_limits<T>::min)()
00288         || n > (std::numeric_limits<T>::max)())
00289             throw exceptions::too_big("value out of range for requested "
00290                 "conversion");
00291 
00292     T rval=0;
00293     size_t len=n._get_length();
00294     for (size_t x=0; x<len; ++x)
00295         rval=static_cast<T>((rval * detail::digit_overflowbit)
00296             + n._get_digit(len-x-1));
00297     if (n.sign() < 0) rval *= -1;
00298     return rval;
00299 }

00303 template <typename charT, typename traits>
00304 inline std::basic_ostream<charT,traits>& operator<<(std::basic_ostream<charT,
00305     traits>& out, const integer& n)
00306 {
00307     int base=((out.flags() & std::ios::hex) ? 16
00308         : (out.flags() & std::ios::oct) ? 8
00309         : 10);
00310     bool upperCase=(out.flags() & std::ios::uppercase ? true : false);
00311 
00312     int nsign=n.sign();
00313     if ((out.flags() & std::ios::showpos) && nsign >= 0) out << "+";
00314 
00315     if (out.flags() & std::ios::showbase) {
00316         if (nsign < 0) out << "-";
00317 
00318         if (base==16 && upperCase) out << "0X";
00319         else if (base==16) out << "0x";
00320         else if (base==8) out << "0";
00321 
00322         out << to_string(abs(n), base, upperCase);
00323     } else {
00324         out << to_string(n, base, upperCase);
00325     }
00326     return out;
00327 }
00328 
00329 template <typename charT, typename traits>
00330 inline std::basic_istream<charT,traits>& operator>>(std::basic_istream<charT,
00331     traits>& in, integer& n)
00332 {
00333     int hex=(in.flags() & std::ios::hex) ? 1 : 0;
00334     int dec=(in.flags() & std::ios::dec) ? 1 : 0;
00335     int oct=(in.flags() & std::ios::oct) ? 1 : 0;
00336     int count=hex+dec+oct;
00337 
00338     size_t base=autobase;
00339     if (count==1) {
00340         if (hex) base=16;
00341         else if (oct) base=8;
00342         else base=10;
00343     } else if (count>1) base=10;
00344     // else auto-base
00345 
00346     std::string s;
00347     if (in.peek()=='+') {
00348         in.ignore();
00349     } else if (in.peek()=='-') {
00350         in.ignore();
00351         s.push_back('-');
00352     }
00353 
00354     if (base==autobase) {
00355         if (in.peek()=='0') {
00356             in.ignore();
00357             int c=in.peek();
00358             if (c=='x' || c=='X') {
00359                 in.ignore();
00360                 base=16;
00361             } else base=8;
00362         } else base=10;
00363     }
00364 
00365     while (in) {
00366         int c=in.peek();
00367         if ((base==8 && (c>='0' && c<='7')) ||
00368             (base==10 && (c>='0' && c<='9')) ||
00369             (base==16 && ((c>='0' && c<='9') || (c>='a' && c<='f') ||
00370                 (c>='A' && c<='F'))))
00371         {
00372             in.ignore();
00373             s.push_back(char(c));
00374         } else break;
00375     }
00376 
00377     try {
00378         integer testValue=from_string(s, base);
00379         n=testValue;
00380     } catch (std::exception&) {
00381         // Catch invalid strings
00382         in.setstate(std::ios::failbit);
00383     }
00384 
00385     return in;
00386 }
